title: #297 - Paulo Freire, Critical Pedagogy
itunes:title: #297 - Paulo Freire, Critical Pedagogy
description: To kick off the new year, Connor and Dan decide to restructure their personal education. And they do so by looking back at the revolutionary pedagogy of Brazilian philosophy Paulo Freire. The first thing Dan should probably learn is how to pronounce his last name!
